_sText:
Newest Flashbangsknives! After some testing, I decided flashbangsknives_v3 wasn't good enough. Instead I immediately started v4. It has been tested on my server, and is known to have some bugs. Unfortunately I can't fix them. 
You might:
-die before being able to play
-have 4 hp when hitting the ground
Also, I've added some smoke grenades and a normal HE grenade.

IMPORTANT: Set the gravity to 780! If not, you will die/you will start with more than 1 HP.
